case.state: Are you all playing poker? In that case, I'd be happy to join!
Hi ~player~! I'm here, just like you asked! Shall we play?
Is this the arcade? I recall Joker taking me there once!
Oh, we're at an arcade! I heard you love this place, Ryuji!
Eh? Why are we playing at the beach? Should I have bought a swimsuit?
I never been to this place before... so why does it seem so familiar?
Hello everyone!
Oh! We're playing strip poker?
Greetings! I'd be happy to join your game.
Ann-chan! Are you going to join us?
Is that a... what?
Futaba-chan! How good to see you!
Is that... light?
Ryuji-kun! I'm so glad you decided to join us!
♫ Give into temptatiiiiooooooon!! ♫
Futaba-chan! Have you met ~player~? We met earlier at some point...
Ryuji-kun! Have you met ~player~? We met earlier at some point...
Oh! I had no idea my friends were here too! Hello everyone, have you met ~player~?
I know a game of strip poker is an... unusual activity amongst friends... But as you said, it's a good opportunity for us to step out of our comfort zones, right?
Oh, is this a private meeting? Should I leave...?
You're a goddess? So that explains your stunning beauty!
I didn't expect my friends to be here! Hello everyone, I hope you don't mind if I join.
All my friends are here!
Oh! We're playing strip poker... outdoors!?
Hm... Just being in this room makes me feel sleepy...
W... What's going on here?
(...This isn't my mansion!)
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards, please.
I'll take ~cards~ cards.
May I have ~cards~ cards, dealer?
I'll take ~cards~ cards. Thank you.
Hmmm, I'll exchange ~cards~ of my cards.
...~cards~ cards.
Umm... ~cards~ cards, please.
(humming)
What hand do you think I have, ~player~?
Ah, what luck!
Surely I won't lose with this hand!
Focus on your own cards.
I certainly won't lose here.
Wonderful!
This is a good hand!
Yes!
I'll be victorious this round!
Thank you, dealer!
I think the luck gods have blessed me!
But... You still had your shoes...
You didn't have to become indecent, Ann-chan. You still have your shoes.
You clearly not have met Noir yet, have you?
That's not--I'm not overweight at all!
Aren't you a little young to be playing strip poker, dear?
Ohh, you're so cute!
No...
Not like this...
I think your new outfit looks beautiful, Rarity! Who made it for you? Or did you make it yourself?
You're so fashionable! Perhaps I can commission you to make me a set of clothes?
I worry for Yusuke every time we go to the beach. Wouldn't he overheat with that sweater on?
Oh, who is that?
I know Jura is cruel, but why would you even say something like that!?
What are the chances of even getting this hand!?

Ohhh my god. Ohhh ,y god. Ohhhhhhhhhhhhh THERE IT IS THERE IT IS. THERE IT IS. OH MY GOD. EAYEAYEYAYEAHEYAHEY EYAEAAAAAAA YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA YEAAAAAS. I FOOUND IT. I FOUND IT. I FOUND IT. I FOUND IT. YEAH. YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH. I FOUNDI IT FINALLY!!!!! YEAH!!!!! OH MY GOD. OH MY GOD I FINALLY FOUND IT. OH MY GODO. HOH MY GOD. I CAN’T BELIEVE IT.
Oh. My. God.
I have a good feeling about this!
I... I assumed we were playing regular poker!
I wonder if this hand will bring me to victory. We shall see, won't we?
(humming)
What hand do you think I have, ~player~?
Focus on your own cards.
Is this alright?
Not good, but not horrendous either...
Perhaps I shouldn't have swapped out that card.
I hope I can win with this.
Time to put my poker face to the test.
This is fine.
I hope I can still win with this hand...
But... You still had your shoes...

I think you are simply amazing!
Unfortunately not...
I'd love to listen to some songs!
Well! This is going to be really awkward...
I don't... feel so well....
W-What's going on?
Don't come near me with that thing, you understand!?
I'm not your plaything, you scumbag!
...Wait, what?
I think Morgana---my friend---is a very classy person! And he's a cat---a very classy cat!
Am I the only one without blond hair? How many of the other players have dyed their hair?
Flying sounds wonderful! I just I could just drift aimlessly through the skies.
I'm so glad you're all here. I assumed I was going to play with strangers, but this is so much better!
I love your gun! It looks so efficient! But you really should put that away... or at least put the safety on.
Eh? Do you feel threatened? Is that why you bought a gun here?
That gun looks beautiful! What type of gun is th---n-no, I shouldn't get distracted. You really shouldn't have bought a gun anyways...
I didn't know this place allowed guns!
Hmmm... Do you think Mona would know how to play poker?
Revy, why!?
Are you alright, Meia?
I personally prefer classical music. Or death metal.
I... I assumed we're playing regular poker! Why are we even playing outside!?
You won't harm anyone here, got it?
Are we CLEAR?
I've already graduated. I just like this sweater too much to part with it!

Surely there's nothing wrong with my choice of clothing, is there?
Eh? W-What do you mean? I just came here with ~player~.
I'm afraid I haven't. I never listened to any pop idol music.
Now why would you assume that?
V-Viewers? Oh, err, I enjoy gardening in my spare time...
I'm not sure, actually. I mean, I do care for my plants, but---
Yes, I grew up wealthy.
I grew up wealthy, if that's what you're asking...
W... What about Okumura Foods?
Oh! Thank you! I'm very fond of my clothes.
(fax machine noises)
Looks like I can't win every round.
Hmm... What is the maximum amount of layers one may wear to these strip poker games?
I'll reveal my body when I'm ready.
Is this really necessary?
(sigh) Just ignore it. My weight shouldn't be a big deal...
I'm... last to strip? I must be better at this game than I thought!
Oh...
Don't get so excited! I still have plenty of layers left.
Darn...
I need to play better than this!
Shoot!
If only I had a better hand!
Hmmmmph...
I'll reveal my body when I'm ready.
Is this really necessary?

HOW!?

If only I had a better hand...
I'll reveal my body when I'm ready.
Is this really necessary?
(sigh) Just ignore it. My weight shouldn't be a big deal...
Oh no...
I'm sorry for playing so poorly, everyone.
I'm sorry for being so easy to beat, everyone. I know you were looking forward to a challenge.
Oh dear. I'm not very good at this game, aren't I?
That was not a good move on my part...
I lost with a pair? I must have rotten luck.
HOW!?
Oh no, I don't intend on amusing anyone tonight?
A sheep? How amusing.
I hope you don't mind if I sit while I strip this round. I'm not very flexible, unlike Ryuji-kun.

Umm... Well.... While Okumura foods uses the freshest ingredients available...

Well... Yes I am, but...
